annotation.text: '''Note:''' Please add any 2011 Remaster releases to either ''Universal Island Records'' or ''Hollywood Records'' and '''not''' '''''Island Records'''''. Any previously added releases which fall under this category should be edited. ---- See also [artist:9dcffd99-eca6-4a09-8dbd-c6c4ed2f20fd|Queen + Paul Rodgers] and [artist:7e07a487-5438-4128-b2d0-f0f18ac08384|Queen + Adam Lambert] for released from Brian May and Roger Taylor collaborating with other singers.
